CustomField.formula: CASE( Sales_Team__c, "Red", "Red Sales Team" & " " & IMAGE("/resource/flag_red", "Red Sales Team"), "Blue", "Blue Sales Team" & " " & IMAGE("/resource/flag_Blue", "Blue Sales Team"), "Purple", "Purple Sales Team" & " " & IMAGE("/resource/Flag_purple", "Purple Sales Team"), "" )
CustomField.label: Sales Team Flag
